context: Underground mining operation evaluating investment in automated safety monitoring systems to reduce workplace accidents and improve compliance

request.purpose: Deployment of IoT sensors and AI monitoring systems across mining operations
request.justification: Reduce accident rate by 30% and ensure compliance with new safety regulations

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% reduction in accidents, improved regulatory compliance, enhanced worker confidence
business_impact.projected_value: $3,000,000 annual savings in insurance and lost productivity

lessons_learned: Worker involvement in technology selection improves adoption rates, pilot testing validates safety benefits
